skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Crafting responsive, interactive user interfaces using React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for seamless web experiences.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Developing robust, secure server-side applications with Node.js, Django, and REST APIs for efficient data handling.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: Designing intuitive, user-friendly layouts that enhance usability, accessibility, and overall digital experience for diverse audiences.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: Building visually stunning, responsive websites on Webflow with custom interactions and optimized performance for client needs.

portfolio.title: Real-Estate Web App
portfolio.description: A real estate web app built with MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js, featuring property listings, user authentication, and dynamic search functionality.

portfolio.title: Github OAuthApp Dashboard
portfolio.description: A GitHub OAuth integration that authenticates users, fetches repositories, displays issues, and pull requests with a secure, token-based React-Node.js architecture.

portfolio.title: Hotel Booking System
portfolio.description: A hotel booking system using Django, enabling room reservations, availability checks, secure payments, and an intuitive interface for guests and administrators.
